definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
lit. a pearl in the palm (idiom)/fig. beloved person (esp. daughter)
to cast pearls before swine (idiom)/not to get proper recognition for one's talents

pinyin: Dong1 fang1 Ming2 zhu1 Dian4 shi4 Ta3

definition: the brightest jewel in the crown
pinyin: huang2 guan1 shang4 de5 ming2 zhu1

sentences.english: Like Dong, Wintour thinks she is never wrong.
sentences.chinese: 与董明珠一样，温图尔认为自己从不出错。

sentences.english: Have you ever been Mingzhu square?
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾经明珠广场吗？

sentences.english: In a clear stream lies an untouched bright pearl.
sentences.chinese: 一颗纯洁璀璨的明珠就卧在清澈溪底。

sentences.english: "Taihu Pearl" Wuxi is a three-year history of the southern city.
sentences.chinese: “太湖明珠”无锡是一座具有三千年历史的江南名城。

sentences.english: China's manufacturing base is a reminder of the Pearl Can.
sentences.chinese: 是中国制造基地的一颗催璨明珠。

sentences.english: Mr Grant dotes on his granddaughter. She's the apple of his eye.
sentences.chinese: 格兰特先生很溺爱他的小孙女，她是他的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Shanghai, known to the world as Oriental Pear, is China's eastern gate to the.
sentences.chinese: 以东方明珠闻名于世的上海市中国通向世界的东大门。

sentences.english: Time tear on Pearl Lam Tin On Zhao smoke.
sentences.chinese: 沧海月明珠有泪，蓝田日暖玉生烟。

sentences.english: Yin Mingzhu arrange corporal Kim bum to monitor Xu Darong all movements.
sentences.chinese: 尹明珠安排下士金范来监视徐大荣的所有动向。

sentences.english: Slender, pretty and vivacious, she was the apple of her parents' eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她苗条美丽，活泼大方，是父母的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Oh, your room is in apple-pie order.
After visiting Chenghuangmiao, we went to Pudong District to visit Dongfang Pearl Towel.
sentences.chinese: 逛完城隍庙后，我们乘车去浦东参观东方明珠。

sentences.english: Want to go shopping? You can go to the Pearl Plaza or the Oriental Plaza.
sentences.chinese: 想购物吗？去明珠广场或东方广场好了。

sentences.english: You know I have husband; Yet you give me a pair of pearls.
sentences.chinese: 君知妾有夫，赠妾双明珠。

sentences.english: He is the apple of our eye.
sentences.chinese: 他是全家人的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Hong Kong is forever a shinning pearl of our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 香港永远是祖国的一颗璀璨明珠。

definition: pearls and jades/jewels/clever remark/beautiful writing/gems of wisdom/genius/outstanding person
to dazzle/to brighten up (a room etc)
jade disk with a hole in the center
many stars/a vast sky full of stars
